title: The Galaxy S22 series will support dual SIM with eSIM at launch
content:
USA is a unique market that has stuck with physical and single SIM card support in smartphones for a long time, even as the rest of the world has progressed onto dual SIM card slots (as default) as well as widespread eSIM support. But this situation is slowly changing for the US too. The newly

The post The Galaxy S22 series will support dual SIM with eSIM at launch appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Samsung Galaxy S22 series comes with eSIM support out of the box, thanks to One UI 4.1, making dual SIM support possible too. Read on!
